trans-unit.source: Provides a unified way of converting types of values to other types, as well as for accessing standard values and subproperties.
trans-unit.target: 提供統一的方式，將類型的值轉換為其他類型，以及用於存取標準值和子屬性。

trans-unit.source: The most common type of converter is one that converts to and from a text representation.
trans-unit.target: 最常見類型是轉換器的轉換和文字表示。

trans-unit.source: The type converter for a class is bound to the class with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 類別的類型轉換器會繫結至具有<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>類別

trans-unit.source: Unless this attribute is overridden, all classes that inherit from this class use the same type converter as the base class.
trans-unit.target: 除非遭到覆寫這個屬性，繼承自這個類別的所有類別會都使用相同的型別轉換子的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For general type system purposes, do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 用於一般類型系統的用途，不會存取型別轉換子直接。

trans-unit.source: Instead, access the appropriate converter by using <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>存取適當的轉換程式

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the code examples provided.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱提供的程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: **Note** For XAML purposes, a XAML processor searches for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> directly, instead of going through <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**基於 XAML，XAML 處理器會搜尋<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>直接管理，而不是經過<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For cases where you do want a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> instance from code, or where you create a shared instance in WPF resources, it is acceptable to construct it directly without referencing <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> or other reflection and type system support.
trans-unit.target: 您希望的情況下<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>從程式碼中，執行個體，或是讓您建立的共用執行個體在 WPF 中資源，是可接受的建構直接不需參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>或其他支援的反映和型別系統。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Classes derived from TypeConverter are often referenced as part of how a XAML processor converts an attribute or initialization text value from markup (which is inherently a string) and generates an object for a run-time representation.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 TypeConverter 類別通常會被參照 XAML 處理器如何將屬性或初始化文字值轉換從標記 （這是原本就是字串） 的一部分，並產生執行階段表示的物件。

trans-unit.source: Custom type authors that intend to support a type conversion behavior for XAML typically implement a TypeConverter class that supports their own unique `ConvertFrom` behavior from a string.
trans-unit.target: 自訂型別作者想要的 XAML 支援類型轉換行為，通常會實作支援自己唯一的 TypeConverter 類別`ConvertFrom`從字串的行為。

trans-unit.source: This behavior enables type conversion from the string provided as a XAML attribute value and provides a XAML processor with the support needed to create an object from the string, so that the object can be produced in a parsed object graph.
trans-unit.target: 此行為可讓從提供做為 XAML 屬性值的字串類型轉換，並提供 XAML 處理器，讓物件可以產生已剖析的物件圖形中，從字串建立物件所需的支援。

trans-unit.source: Custom types or members of custom types are indicated by applying <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> to the definitions, with the attribute referencing the custom TypeConverter implementation.
trans-unit.target: 自訂型別或成員的自訂型別以套用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>定義，具有屬性參考自訂 TypeConverter 實作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Type Converters for XAML Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[類型轉換器 XAML 概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 永遠不會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.target: 如果`destinationType`是一個字串的預設實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertTo%2A>一律會傳回`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertTo%2A>

trans-unit.target: 使用`context`參數可以用於擷取的環境從中叫用這個轉換子的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be `null`, so always check it.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是`null`，所以一定要檢查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，物件上的屬性可能會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: For XAML purposes, you do not typically provide branching implementations based on `culture`.
trans-unit.target: 基於 XAML，您不通常提供分支實作根據`culture`。

trans-unit.source: This is because XAML is precompiled in a development environment context, and culture-specific information for runtime XAML is not relevant for XAML type conversion.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為在開發環境內容中，先行編譯的 XAML 時，執行階段的特定文化特性資訊 XAML 無關 XAML 類型轉換。

trans-unit.source: Custom type authors that intend to support a type conversion behavior for XAML typically implement a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> class that supports <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> behavior from a string.
trans-unit.target: 自訂型別作者想要的 XAML 支援類型轉換行為，通常會實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>支援類別<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>從字串的行為。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: These type converters might also implement ConvertTo to support serialization back to XAML.
trans-unit.target: 這些型別轉換子也可能會實作 ConvertTo 來支援 XAML 序列化。

trans-unit.source: Some XAML serialization scenarios cannot be adequately addressed with <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> alone.
trans-unit.target: 某些 XAML 序列化的情況下無法適當地處理與<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>單獨。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: In these cases, it may be necessary to also define a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer> that handles the serialization cases that would otherwise be handled by ConvertTo.
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下，可能有必要也定義<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer>可處理的序列化情況，否則會由 ConvertTo。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of standard values from the default context for the data type this type converter is designed for.
trans-unit.target: 從這個型別轉換子所針對的資料類型的預設內容中傳回標準值的集合。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, this method always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 在這個類別中實作時，這個方法一律會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> containing a standard set of valid values, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the data type does not support a standard set of values.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>包含一組標準的有效值，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果資料類型不支援的標準值集合。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of standard values for the data type this type converter is designed for when provided with a format context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回資料類型，提供格式內容時，針對此型別轉換子的標準值的集合。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>, this method always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 在中實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>，這個方法一律會傳回`null`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context that can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，提供格式內容，可用來擷取要從中叫用這個轉換子的環境的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數或這個參數的屬性可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> that holds a standard set of valid values, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the data type does not support a standard set of values.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>保存一組標準的有效值，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果資料類型不支援的標準值集合。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the collection of standard values returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exclusive list.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的標準值集合是否從傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>是獨占清單。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, this method always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在這個類別中實作時，這個方法一律會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果是獨占清單，例如在列舉資料型別，則沒有其他有效值。

trans-unit.source: If the list is not exclusive, then other valid values might exist in addition to the list of standard values that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method provides.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單不是獨佔的則除了的清單，可能還有其他有效值標準值<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法提供。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the values are exclusive, the list returned by <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> should not allow these values to be edited.
trans-unit.target: 如果是獨占值，所傳回的清單<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>應該不允許編輯這些值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exhaustive list of possible values; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if other values are possible.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果從<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>，是可能的值的獨占清單<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果其他的值為可能。 </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection></xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the collection of standard values returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exclusive list of possible values, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的標準值集合是否從傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>是可能的值，使用指定的內容的獨占清單。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exhaustive list of possible values; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if other values are possible.

trans-unit.target: 傳回這個物件是否支援一組標準可從清單中挑選的值。

trans-unit.target: 使用`context`參數可以用於擷取的環境從中叫用這個轉換子的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be `null`, so always check it.

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the given value object is valid for this type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回是否適用於此類型指定的值物件。

trans-unit.source: Starting in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.IsValid%2A> method catches exceptions from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.IsValid%2A>方法攔截例外狀況，從<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the input value type causes <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> to return `false`, or if the input value causes <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> to raise an exception, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.IsValid%2A> method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果輸入的值類型會導致<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>傳回`false`，或如果輸入的值會導致<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>引發例外狀況，<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.IsValid%2A>方法會傳回`false`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.IsValid%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: To enable the legacy behavior, insert the following lines into the configuration file of the application, for example, application1.exe.config.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用舊版行為，將下列行插入應用程式，例如 application1.exe.config 的組態檔。

trans-unit.source: The object to test for validity.
trans-unit.target: 要測試有效性的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the given value object is valid for this type and for the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回給定的值的物件是否有效，此類型和指定的內容。

trans-unit.source: Use the `context` parameter to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 使用`context`參數可以用於擷取的環境從中叫用這個轉換子的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be `null`, so always check it.

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，物件上的屬性可能會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Starting in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the IsValid method catches exceptions from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，IsValid 方法攔截例外狀況，從<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the input value type causes <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> to return `false`, or if the input value causes <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> to raise an exception, the IsValid method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果輸入的值類型會導致<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>傳回`false`，或如果輸入的值會導致<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>IsValid 方法會傳回引發例外狀況， `false`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sorts a collection of properties.
trans-unit.target: 排序屬性的集合。

trans-unit.source: All properties in the collection that are not already in the array of names are added alphabetically to the end.
trans-unit.target: 集合中所有不存在於名稱的陣列的屬性會依字母順序加入至結尾。

trans-unit.source: If the `names` parameter is an empty array or `null`, all the properties in the collection are sorted alphabetically.
trans-unit.target: 如果`names`參數是空陣列或`null`，依字母順序排序集合中的所有屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that has the properties to sort.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref>的已排序的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of names in the order you want the properties to appear in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在順序中的名稱陣列您想要在集合中出現的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains the sorted properties.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含已排序的屬性。
